trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILDRYBONE_00058_RAULIN_000<tab>Ye an adventurer, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? Ye've got that look about ye. Need help findin' yer way?
TEXT_REGWILDRYBONE_00058_SCENE00000A2<tab>What kind of place is Camp Drybone?
TEXT_REGWILDRYBONE_00058_RAULIN_010<tab>After me wife was laid to rest in the lichyard nigh on ten summers ago, I started spendin' more time here. Wanted to stay close to her, ye know?
TEXT_REGWILDRYBONE_00058_RAULIN_011<tab>One day, I started helpin' out with the funeral rites. One rite led to another, an' I ended up doin' it for a livin'.
TEXT_REGWILDRYBONE_00058_RAULIN_012<tab>Just goes to show ye never know what the fates have in store, heh. I like to think me wife's proud of the work I do.

TEXT_REGWILDRYBONE_00058_RAULIN_020<tab>'Tis a peaceful place for the most part. A lot of folk as perished in the Calamity are interred here─no room left in the city, ye see─and their loved ones come to pay their respects.
TEXT_REGWILDRYBONE_00058_RAULIN_021<tab>Of course, people also come bearin' the bodies of the recently deceased, so the church always has its hands full attendin' to everyone's needs.
